sentences.en: And the tabs intensified the circumferential vortices greatly in addition to the generation of streamwise vortices.
sentences.cn: 并且发现,小突片结构不仅能产生流向涡,而且对周向涡有明显的强化作用.

sentences.en: Dustdevils are a well-known atmospheric phenomena on Mars, and as these new observations show, the devilish vortices can carve beautiful patterns in the Martian dust.
sentences.cn: 尘暴是一种著名的火星大气现象，并且依照这些新的观测显示，这种恶魔般的旋涡形成可以在火星的尘埃上雕刻美丽的图案。

sentences.en: Moving the perturbation location along the circumference gives an expected series of asymmetric vortices.
sentences.cn: 通过控制微扰动的周向位置可以获得期望的非对称多重涡流场.

sentences.en: One does this by redistributing the aerodynamic load along the wingspan or by incorporating the vortices coming off the horizontal stabilizer.
sentences.cn: 为了造成这种结果，一个办法是沿著翼展重新分配空气动力负载，或是设法利用机尾水平稳定翼所产生的涡流。

sentences.en: Polar vortices are found on Earth, Jupiter , Mars and Venus, and are colder than their surroundings.
sentences.cn: 人们在地球 、 木星 、 火星和金星上都发现了极地涡流,它们比周围的气候环境更冷.

sentences.en: So it follows that everything that happens in the physical world , all the motion that happens must be a series of vortices, whirlpools one within another within another and so on .
sentences.cn: 接下来便引出所有事物都发生在物质世界中，所有运动都会产生一系列的涡流，旋窝一个接着一个的出现。

sentences.en: The bumps on a whale's flipper help form vortices that generate more lift, more smoothly.
sentences.cn: 鱼鳍上突起的部分有助于形成涡旋,也就更增大上升力 、 减小阻力.

sentences.en: The dynamic nature of this vortex is similar to behaviour observed in other vortices on Earth, including those observed at the centre of hurricanes.
sentences.cn: 这个漩涡的动态原理和在地球上观察到的其他漩涡包括在飓风中心观察到的情况相近。

sentences.en: The frequency sense element is a hardcore in the eddy street flowmeter. The lift force of vortices influences the sensitivity of the frequency sense element.
sentences.cn: 在涡街流量计中，频率感测元件是其核心部件，旋涡上举力的大小直接影响到感测元件的灵敏度。

sentences.en: The Rankine and Lamb vortex corc models are mixed, and the secondary dis - crete vortices are taken.
sentences.cn: 试用了混合的Rankine和Lamb涡模型及二次离散涡.

sentences.en: The result displays the velocity and pressure distributing around the column and presence of vortices.
sentences.cn: 从模拟出来的流场分布可以清晰地看到圆柱周围速度的分布、压力的分布及漩涡的出现.

sentences.en: The transport process inside tube is also enhanced by Dean vortices.
sentences.cn: 由于Dean旋涡的存在,缠绕式膜组件也可促进膜管内的传递.

sentences.en: The vortices are caused by quantum - mechanical inference scatterers and are accentuated by evanescent states.
sentences.cn: 涡流出现是量子相干散射造成的,并与衰减模式的存在有重要关系.

sentences.en: There are horse shoe vortex around spur dikes and Karman vortices behind spur dikes.
sentences.cn: 发现在丁坝的上游会形成马蹄涡,在丁坝的背风面会形成卡门涡.

sentences.en: These swirls of light, called optical vortices, could have implications for future laser devices, the physicists said.
sentences.cn: 这些光线的漩涡，称为光学旋涡，可能对未来的激光装置产生影响，物理学家说。

sentences.en: These vortices developed within 30 minutes or so of each other.
sentences.cn: 这些涡旋的产生彼此相隔半小时左右.

sentences.en: Vortices accelerate reaction rates of the unreacted region.
sentences.cn: 旋涡加速了未反应区的化学反应速率.

trans.tran_cn: 旋涡，（指水或风形成的）涡流( vortex的名词复数 )，漩涡，低涡，感情（或力量、局势）的旋涡
